docs.text: Getting Started ¶ Installation ¶ till can be downloaded from CRAN . We provide a standard R interface, so no surpises there. install.packages ( "till" ) Once, you downloaded till , you can activate your license using the built-in function till::activate_license() . Simply, run this command and you will be able to use our R API. Make sure are connected to the internet while doing so. Example ¶ library ( till )
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: till can be downloaded from CRAN . We provide a standard R interface, so no surpises there. install.packages ( "till" ) Once, you downloaded till , you can activate your license using the built-in function till::activate_license() . Simply, run this command and you will be able to use our R API. Make sure are connected to the internet while doing so.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Getting Started ¶ Installation ¶ till can be downloaded from PyPi . We provide a standard Python interface, so no surpises there. $ pip install till Once you downloaded till , you will need to activate your license using the built-in method till.activate_license() . Simply run this command and you will be able to use our Python API. Make sure are connected to the internet while doing so. Example ¶ from till import engine
docs.title: Getting Started
